creator: Otipass
descriptionHtml:
The Bordeaux City Pass is the best option for those looking to make the most of their stay. It gives you access to the Cité du Vin, 20 museums and monuments, city tours, unlimited access to public transport and also includes a personalised help service which answers any questions that you may have during your stay.

The Bordeaux City Pass is available for 24, 48 or 72 consecutive hours and can be bought online at www.bordeauxcitypass.com or at the Bordeaux tourist board.

The supporting app gives detailed information about all the points of interest included in the Bordeaux CityPass, such as current exhibitions, opening hours, their locations on Google Maps, pictures, descriptions and contact details.

Usable offline, the Bordeaux City Pass app is a digital and interactive city guide that is ideal for your stay in the Bordeaux region.
descriptionShort: Discover the digital tourist guide for Bordeaux City Pass
